title: Back to Campus from COVID
description: The COVID-19 situation is still full of uncertainties. Even with vaccinations and other measures, the growth of the number of cases is not slowing down enough. Universities have decided to keep in place agile working approaches. While suggesting to work and study from home as much as possible, they allow people to return to the shared workplace. However, facility managers and people responsible for on-campus activities need to define working policies that both satisfy people's needs and government guidelines. To do so, they asked people working and studying on campus to express their opinion on this matter.
